comments.author: Xi
comments.content:
Here's a tip - read the fine print. With your head eyes.

Contracts are the only things that consistently hold my attention long enough from beginning to end. As ethical as my company is, I read every single word of my employment contract.

The cancellation t&c's with Docomo seem particularly bastardy however. Even here, if you cancelled your mobile contract way after your minimum contract length, you're not charged a cancellation fee, it's only when you cancel before your time is up that there's a penalty.

comments.author: randy
comments.content: The fine print was in Japanese... But yes, I concede your point.
